director.name: 格劳贝尔·罗恰 Glauber Rocha

introduction: 巴西电影大师Glauber Rocha在1968年拍摄的圣保罗街头大游行,青年人的反抗独裁暴乱,导致了上百的人死伤,当时作为导演兼新闻记者的罗查与好友巴西著名摄影师Affonso Beato走上街头,用16mm摄影机记录下了那令人震撼的时刻,影片并没有录制声音.Unfinished documentary about the "March of the 100,000", driven by the student movement against brazilian dictatorship in 1968. Glauber directed with "Antonio das Mortes'" cinematographer, Affonso Beatto. A mysterious filmIMPRINTNon-fiction, 35mm, black and white, 600 meters, 22 minutes. Rio de Janeiro, 1968. Directors: Glauber Rocha, Alfonso Beato; Photographer: Alfonso Beato; Location: City of Rio de Janeiro.
